casebody.data:
STATE of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Movant,
v.
Leo C. PINKSTON, Defendant. M-806 September Term 2017
080118 Supreme Court of New Jersey. February 27, 2018

ORDER

The Court having determined that the appeal raises an issue of public importance that is capable of repetition yet evades review, it is ORDERED that the motion to dismiss is denied; and it is further

ORDERED that, with the agreement of defendant and the State, the trial court is authorized to proceed with sentencing.
